mapper.sql: id, name, adress, mid, isUse, price, aplces, laplces, rplces, createTime
mapper.insert: insert into machine (id, name, adress, mid, isUse, price, aplces, laplces, rplces, createTime) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isuse,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aplces,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{laplces,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rplces,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into machine
id,
name,
adress,
mid,
isUse,
price,
aplces,
laplces,
rplces,
createTime,

mapper.update:
update machine
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
adress = #{adress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mid = #{mid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
isUse = #{isuse,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
price = #{price,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
aplces = #{aplces,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
laplces = #{laplces,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rplces = #{rplces,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update machine set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, adress = #{adress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mid = #{mid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isUse = #{isuse,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{price,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, aplces = #{aplces,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, laplces = #{laplces,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rplces = #{rplces,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select count(1) FROM machine
and title like '%${whereMap.title}%'
and PRICE > whereMap.minPrice
and PRICE < whereMap.maxPrice
